properties.entry: SELECT (SELECT P_IMG1 FROM TB_PRODUCT_IMG I WHERE I.P_ID = P.P_ID) "P_PICTURE" , P_NAME , P_NETPRICE , P_STOCK , TO_CHAR(P_ENROLL_DATE, 'YY/MM/dd') "P_ENROLL_DATE" , P_SALES , (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY C WHERE C.CATEGORY_NO = P.CATEGORY_NO) "CATEGORY_NAME" FROM TB_PRODUCT P WHERE SEL_NO = ?
SELECT CATEGORY_NO , CATEGORY_DETAIL , CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_CATEGORY

SELECT P_ID ,P_NAME ,P_NETPRICE ,P_DETAIL ,P_STOCK ,P_ENROLL_DATE ,P_RETURN_YN ,P_TAG_YN ,P_SALES ,P_DAY_DELIVERY ,P_GIFT ,SEL_NO ,CATEGORY_NO ,SEL_STORE_NAME ,NVL(DISCOUNT_RATE,0) DISCOUNT_RATE ,P_IMG1 ,SEL_IMG ,CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT P JOIN TB_SELLER S USING(SEL_NO) JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMG USING (P_ID) LEFT JOIN TB_DISCOUNT D USING(P_ID)

SELECT REVIEW_ID ,R.P_ID "P_ID" ,REVIEW_RATING ,REVIEW_DETAIL ,REVIEW_IMG ,REVIEW_REPLY ,REVIEW_ADD_DATE ,MEM_ID FROM TB_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN TB_MEM_ORDER_DETAIL O USING(OD_ID) ORDER BY REVIEW_ADD_DATE DESC
